ygData.subject: Smithing changes with latest patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard weapon smithing is now implemented! Unfortunately they re not quite as good as FS, so hopefully they ll be either enchantable or a stepping-stone to
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard weapon smithing is now implemented! Unfortunately they're not quite as good as FS, so hopefully they'll be either enchantable or a stepping-stone to a high enough skill level to make plate.

Another item, not exactly a change but of interest to those smiths who are paladins like myself: the new Temple zone supposedly has a Paladin who will give you or give you quests for molds to make special armor.

I can't get on to see what other changes may have taken place to smithing, but check your vendors, check your books, and post back to the list what you find.

Thanks,

Araman of E'ci
17th level Paladin
Skill 142 Smith
